comment: I hope you have a wonderful day!
This is the worst thing ever.
Thanks so much for your help.
Such a pleasure to work with you.
This is garbage and so are you.
You're the worst person I know.
It was really nice seeing you.
Wow, you're really good at making everyone around you uncomfortable
Oh, great job! I’ve never seen anyone mess up that badly before.
Yeah, because that’s exactly what we needed. More of your genius ideas.
Oh, fantastic! Another mistake. You’re on fire today!
Oh, you’re amazing! Just like a broken clock.
What a surprise, you’ve done it again. Failed spectacularly!
You’ve got this! I mean, not really.
I love how you always have the perfect solution. Just kidding, you have no idea what you’re doing.
Oh, that was a brilliant move. I can’t believe no one thought of that before.
Perfect, just what we needed! Another suggestion from the person who always gets it wrong.
Oh, sure! Because nothing says 'great idea' like a suggestion from you.
You really outdid yourself this time! I’m amazed, truly.
Wow, that’s such a great solution. I can’t believe no one else thought of it before.
Great job! It’s not like I could’ve figured that out on my own.
